Name: Capricornia
Description:
The Division of Capricornia consists of:

  • Isaac Regional Council,
  • Livingstone Shire Council,
  • part of the Mackay Regional Council,
  • part of the Rockhampton Regional Council, and
  • part of the Whitsunday Regional Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Primary production, grains, beef cattle, grazing, fishing, coal mining, meat works, dairy products and tourism.
NameDerivation: Named in recognition of the Tropic of Capricorn.

DemographicRating: Provincial - outside capital cities, but with a majority of enrolment in major provincial cities
